author: glenn
msg: Port JDBCStore and StoreBase patches from Tomcat 4.1

author: jfarcand
msg: Re-design the way doPrivileged block are created when the SecurityManager is on.

ApplicationContext no longer have privileged block. Since this class is used via the Facade, the doPrivileged blocks are now there. To avoid having too many inner classes, I have implemented a cache where method objects are stored.
Also add some missing doPrivileged blocks in coyote and removed unused jasper one.
I didn't implement the cache for the coyote classes since it might affect performance.
Please review. I have ran the watchdog test, jsp examples and servlet examples.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TOMCAT_5_0_1'.

author: jfarcand
msg: Allow alternate deployment descriptor name (J2EE.8.3.1). By default this value will not be set.
